entry.title: New BIP32 structure
entry.summary: Luke-Jr, a user in an online forum, suggests that any wallet can import all coins without any issue but will not use any account besides account 0. He clarifies that once the unspent transaction outputs (UTXOs) are in the wallet, they are no longer associated with the address or any other details of how they were received. However, another user argues that this is idealistic because the wallet needs to know how it got the UTXO in order to spend it. The discussion ends with no further comments or information provided.
